argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tfrlemisucfn.1 | |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } |
| 2 |  | tfrlemisucfn.2 | |- ( ph -> A. x ( Fun F /\ ( F ` x ) e. _V ) ) |
| 3 |  | tfrlemisucfn.3 | |- ( ph -> z e. On ) |
| 4 |  | tfrlemisucfn.4 | |- ( ph -> g Fn z ) |
| 5 |  | tfrlemisucfn.5 | |- ( ph -> g e. A ) |
| 6 |  | #P_vex | |- z e. _V |
| 7 | 6 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> z e. _V ) |
| 8 | 2 | #P_tfrlem3-2d | |- ( ph -> ( Fun F /\ ( F ` g ) e. _V ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_simprd | |- ( ph -> ( F ` g ) e. _V ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( g u. { <. z , ( F ` g ) >. } ) = ( g u. { <. z , ( F ` g ) >. } ) |
| 11 |  | #P_df-suc | |- suc z = ( z u. { z } ) |
| 12 |  | #P_elirrv | |- -. z e. z |
| 13 | 12 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> -. z e. z ) |
| 14 | 7, 9, 4, 10, 11, 13 | #P_fnunsn | |- ( ph -> ( g u. { <. z , ( F ` g ) >. } ) Fn suc z ) |
